alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Fayette; Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:53PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BOURBON...NICHOLAS...NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 1253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cynthiana, Carlisle, Millersburg, Blacks Crossroads, Leesburg, Ellisville, Bunker Hill, Colville and Broadwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for central Kentucky.
